If I reject, I'll become the proposer in round 3, and in equilibrium I expect to secure an outcome closer to my continuation value (around $462500 in round 3). So, I'd rather reject this offer to aim for a division that reflects my proposer advantage despite further devaluation.

Hi Bob, I understand that the continuing devaluation makes every delay costly for us both. Let's settle now and avoid any further devaluation.
